input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Show Chrome Accessories 21-334 Highway Round Rail Peg System

Item keywords:
Fits Universal 1-1/4 inch Highway Bars
Works with Show Chrome Accessories Highway Bars
Chrome Finished Round Rail Style Peg Design
Sold as a Pair
input_text.Response A:
Includes Mounting Hardware
Fits 2011-2019 Harley Davidson Softail Models
Fits 2018-2020 Harley Davidson Softail Models (Fits 2018-2020 FXBBS, FXDR, FXLR, FXST, FXSTC, FXSTS, FXSTSB, FXSTSE, FXSTSS, FXSTS, FXSTSB, FXSTSE, FXSTSS)
Fits 2015-2020 Harley Davidson Softail Models (Fits 2015-2020 FXB, FXBBS, FXBR, FXBR, FXBRS, FXBSE, FXBSS, FXBST, FXBR, FXBBS, FXBR, FXBRS, FXBSE, FXBSS, FXBST, FXBR, FXBBS, FXBR, FXBRS, FXBSE, FXBSS, FXBST)
Fits 2018-2020 Harley Davidson Softail Models (Fits 2018-2020 FLBBS, FLBSE, FLBSS, FLBST, FLBS, FLBR, FLDSE, FLDSS, FLDST, FLDBS, FLDE, FLD)
Fits 2018-2020 Harley Davidson Softail Models (Fits 2018-2020 FLBBS, FLBSE, FLBSS, FLBST, FLBS, FLBR, FLDSE, FLDSS, FLDST, FLDBS, FLDE, FLD)

Here is an example product description:

Show Chrome Accessories 21-334 Highway Round Rail Pegs are a great addition to your 1-1/4 inch highway bars. They are designed with a chrome finish and have a round rail style peg. They are sold as a pair and include mounting hardware. These pegs fit universal and Show Chrome Accessories highway bars. They are a great accessory for your Softail model bike. They will give you an added level of comfort and convenience on your next ride.
input_text.Response B: The billet aluminum Highway Clamp with Rail Peg has a pivoting foot peg for folding the pegs out of the way when they are not in use. Fits Show Chrome Accessories Highway Bars, OEM and aftermarket 1-1/4 inch Highway Bars/Engine Guards.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A is better as you know exactly at a glance what models it fits.
